All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddChatPrivateMessageCommand
Concrete command to add a private message to the chat.
AddChatPublicMessageCommand
Concrete command to add a public message to the chat.
AddPlayerToPendingCommand
Concrete command used to add a player to a list of pending players, that will be able to enter a new or existing game.
Board
Class representing the Board containing scores.
BoardGridLayout
Enumerated class containing relative coordinates for players' token colors on the board.
BoardTui
Interface containing methods to print Board.
BoardView
Client's copy of model Board.
BoardViewListener
Listener of the client's Board copy.
Card
Abstract class that represents the generic cards of the game
CardHandUpdate
Update used to show new card hand.
CardType
Enum class representing card types.
Chat
Class representing the chat of the game.
ChatMessage
Class representing a message.
ChatMessageUpdate
Update used to show received message.
ChatTui
Interface containing methods to print Chat.
ChatView
Client's copy of model Chat.
ChatViewListener
Listener of the client's Chat copy.
Client
Interface representing a client.
ClientMain
 
CommandResult
Enumeration class representing all the possible results of an action performed by a player.
CommandResultUpdate
Update used to show the new command result.
Condition
Interface representing conditions found on game cards: these conditions can be placing conditions or scoring conditions.
ConnectionUpdate
Update used to show the new connection status of a player in the same game.
CornerCoverageCondition
Condition of corner coverage.
Deck<T>
Class representing a collection of cards.
DecksBuilder
Class used to parse decks' JSON files and build game decks.
DeckTui
Interface containing methods to print usable deck cards.
DeckUpdate
Update used to show new decks' available cards.
DeckView
Client's copy of model decks, contains only cards the player can use at the moment.
DeckViewListener
Listener of the client's decks copy.
DisconnectPlayerCommand
Concrete command to disconnect a player from the game.
DisplayGamesCommand
Concrete command used to receive a list of existing games when choosing a game to join.
DrawableCard
Class that represents non-starter cards.
DrawableDeck<T>
Class representing decks used during the game from which a player can draw.
DrawDeckCardCommand
Concrete command used to draw a covered card from a certain deck.
DrawFaceUpCardCommand
Concrete command to draw one of the two faceUp cards of a given type.
ExistingGamesUpdate
Update used to show games that have available places.
FullChatUpdate
Update used to send the full chat content, used, for example, after a disconnection.
FullGameFieldUpdate
Update containing the full game field content.
GameCommand
Interface representing a general game command.
GameController
Class representing the controller of a single game.
GameControllerCommand
Interface representing a game controller command.
GameEndedSceneController
Controller of GAME_ENDED_SCENE.
GameEndedUpdate
Update used to notify the game is ended.
GameField
Class representing the game field of a single player, it contains all the cards the player has placed, including both their position and the way cards are placed.
GameFieldTui
Interface containing methods to print GameField.
GameFieldView
Client's copy of model GameField.
GameFieldViewListener
Listener of the client's GameField copy.
GameItem
Interface representing a placeholder for a GameResource or a GameObject
GameModel
Class representing the model of a single game.
GameModelUpdate
Update containing general model info.
GameObject
Enum class representing objects that can be found on cards.
GameResource
Enum class representing resources that can be found on cards.
GamesManager
Class representing the lobby controller, manager creation of games, adds players to games and deletes games.
GamesManagerCommand
Interface representing a games manager command.
GameState
Enumeration representing the possible states of a game.
GameView
General client's copy of the game model, contains general info about the game and the reference to other model view elements.
GameViewListener
Listener of class GameView, used to send general update to Ui.
GoldCard
Class that represents gold cards.
Gui
 
GuiController
Class representing the gui controller of a scene.
ItemsCondition
Condition regarding the presence of some given items on the game field.
JoinExistingGameCommand
Concrete command to add a pending player to an existing game.
JoinNewGameCommand
Concrete command to add a pending player to a new game.
LayoutCondition
Condition regarding cards placement on the game field and their color, i.e.
LobbySceneController
Controller of LOBBY_SCENE.
ModelListener
Interface representing a listener of the model.
NicknameCheck
Enumeration class representing the possible values to a nickname check.
ObjectiveCard
Class that represents objective cards of the game.
OtherPlayerSceneController
Controller of OTHER_PLAYER_SCENE.
PingPongManager
Class used by the game controller to manage connections and disconnections in the game.
PlaceableCard
Class that represents placeable cards of the game.
PlaceCardCommand
Concrete command to place a card.
PlacedCardUpdate
Update used to show a new card has been placed in the game field.
Player
Class representing a player.
PlayerSceneController
Controller of PLAYER_SCENE.
PlayersUpdate
Update used to show the list of players in the game has changed: used when players join.
PlayerTui
Interface containing methods to print Player's card hand and personal cards.
PlayerView
Client's copy of model Player.
PlayerViewListener
Listener of the client's Player copy.
PlayingDeck<T>
Class representing decks used during the whole game.
PongUpdate
Update used to send a pong to the client.
PrivateChatMessage
Class representing a private message.
ReconnectPlayerCommand
Concrete command used to reconnect a player to a game.
RefreshGameViewCommand
Concrete command used to ask a full game view update.
RmiClient
Class representing a client using Rmi.
RmiServerGame
Class representing the Rmi server of a single game.
RmiServerGamesManager
Class representing the Rmi server of the lobby.
SafePrinter
Class used to implement safe (synchronized) print methods.
SceneType
Enum class representing all the scenes of the user interface.
ScoreUpdate
Update used to notify the new score of a certain player in the same game.
SecretObjectivesUpdate
Update used to notify a player of his secret objectives cards.
SendPingCommand
Concrete command used from clients to send a ping to their ping receiver in the game controller.
ServerMain
 
SetInitialCardsCommand
Concrete command to place the starter card in a certain way.
SocketClient
Class representing a client using Socket.
SocketClientHandler
Class that manages the whole communication with a specific client.
SocketCommunication
Enumeration used for managing game joining with Socket.
SocketServer
Class representing the GamesManager server used in socket based communication, this class manages the ServerSocket.
StageController
Controller that manages the stage by changing scenes.
StallUpdate
Update sent to notify a player has stalled.
StarterCardUpdate
Update used to show a player his starter card.
TokenColor
Enum class representing token colors in the game.
Tui
 
Ui
 
Update
Interface that represent an update the model sends to a client.
UpdateSender
Class used by the model to send updates to clients on separate threads.
VirtualServerGame
Virtual server of the single game.
VirtualServerGamesManager
Virtual server of the lobby server.
VirtualSocketServer
Class used to abstract the network from the client side, this class manages the communication from client to server.
VirtualView
Interface representing the virtual client.
WrongNumberOfPlayersException
Exception meaning that there is not a correct number of players.
